name: Bella Coterie Luxury Silk Pillowcase for Hair and Skin | 30 Momme | 100% Pure 6A Mulberry Silk | Super Soft | Perfectly Plush [Standard, Silver]
about_this_item: FAREWELL FACIAL CREASES-Your skin will glide effortlessly across the ultratight 30 momme weave of our luxurious silk pillowcase, fighting wrinkles while you sleep.
DITCH THE DRY SKIN-Skip cotton or satin covers that steal moisture. Our superiorly soft silk pillowcase helps you retain moisture for the secret to glamorous, glowing skin.

BYE BYE BREAKOUTS-Fight acne while you snooze with the natural amino acids found in pure mulberry silk. Our ultra soft pillowcases, made of natural fibers, won't irritate skin or clog pores. Hello beauty sleep!

NO MORE KNOTTING-Sleek hair starts with your sleep! Proteins in 100% organic silk threads keep your hair moisturized, while the super smooth finish prevents knotting and breakage for effortlessly luscious locks.

THE BC GUARANTEE-Here at BELLA COTERIE we're on a mission to level up your beauty sleep. Treat yourself to our silk pillowcases risk-free for 30 days with our 100% customer satisfaction guarantee. Once you sleep in the lap of luxury, you'll never go back!

title: High quality for the price
content: Don't trust the 5-star ratings for pillow cases that are below 25 momme.  I suspect people just haven't tried the higher ones and don't know how comparatively better they are.  This pillowcase is 30 momme and feels incredible against your skin.  The color is gorgeous.  It does wrinkle, stains are visible if you're a drooler, and it's a bit of a pain to have to wash separately with gentle detergent (I put mine in a vented washable laundry bag), and then you do have to iron them in a particular way.  But all silk pillowcases suffer from this, and I think it's worth the effort for a cool night of sleeping and better hair in the morning.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: After reading reviews on sizing problems, I decided to get queen-sized, as my pillows are standard-sized, but they're thick, high-quality foam cooling pillows, so I was concerned that the standard-size pillowcases offered by this company might be too small. Getting the queen-size was the right choice. There will be extra pillowcase material (around one to two inches worth) if you size up, but these are zippered, so I had no concerns about them falling off the pillows. If you don't mind pillowcases that aren't snug against the pillow, sizing up might be an option for you, of you're concerned about the pillowcases not fitting.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2024

title: Love These
content: I use silk pillowcases, as my hair is prone to "bird nesting" during sleep. Silk pillowcases definitely help with this. I cannot say anything about any supposed skin benefits, as my skin has always been pretty blemish-free. I still get the occasional blemish, because life, regardless of what pillowcase material I use.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023

title: Verified Purchase

title: Very nice
content: For the price, these are really high-quality. I've bought cheaper silk pillowcases, and while they work, you can really feel the difference. My old silk set felt less silky, and not as buttery-smooth as this new pillowcase. I only paid $60 for TWO of my old pillowcases, which is the price for ONE of this company's pillowcases, so it's definitely a "You pay for the quality you receive" scenario. Yes, these are expensive (but certainly not the most expensive), but you can feel the difference, and the quality is definitely there. This single pillowcase feels and is made just as well as the top-of-the-line (think $1k plus) silk bedding set I received as a wedding gift, without the shocking price tag.

title: Sleep Aide
content: I received my silk pillowcase quickly.  The navy color was spot on and the thickness was as described and actually very sumptuous.  Was happy to find the zipper worked very well for a hidden zipper (no catching the fabric) as this was one of the two factors I wanted.  The problem: there was an odor immediately upon opening the package which did not dissipate over days.  Smelled like someone‚Äôs sweaty head. There were also several dark spots that looked like oily stains, and two whitish flecks on the surface of the case.  I have hand washed the pillowcase twice with Woolite and I believe the sopts are no longer visible.  The odor is gone too.  Had I not been exhausted from a holiday of online orders and some returns, I would certainly have sent this back immediately.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Yes, I was confused when I received these because the quality was so great that I legitimately thought these were dupes. Due to the higher and denser weave, the material is thicker with a shinier sheen. The inside of the fabric also feels different than all my other lower momme mulberry silk items. I own many silk pieces but none in 30 momme so I was really excited to buy two sets of these 30 momme silk pillow cases in gray and white. The colors are as shown. It‚Äôs well sewn and appears to be of high quality. What sold me on these being real was I cut a few small pieces of fabric from the inner corner seams and it pass the burn test. It also smelled like human hair when burned, and it turned into a fine dust with no balling or anything to indicate plastic or other material. I am glad I got these now that I feel more confident that they‚Äôre real.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I can only compare this to a satin pillowcase that i still own and use for guests. This is much stronger and more dense, when hand washing the two together its very obvious the materials and construction are top notch. Its less scratchy than the satin when dry. Takes a bit longer to drip dry in comparison obviously. But there's also the "fall asleep" factor, if you struggle in that area this pillowcase will help to knock you out, for that alone it's worth the price. Less frizz and knots upon waking. Anyway can't put a price on better sleep. Would definitely recommend.
